creator: GAMEVIL
descriptionHtml:
■About the Game■

▶ Customize your characters!
Create character designs that are uniquely you!
Design your characters however you want, from adorable to charismatic!
Express yourself through character gestures. There's even dancing!

▶ Accessories aren't just there for looks! They also boost your Combat Power!
Spruce up your characters with Costumes, Guardian Fairies, Rides, and Wings!
- Rides: Explore the world of TALION with unique Rides designed after different creatures, such as ostriches, rays, etc.
- Costumes: Try on various weapon and outfit Costumes for that perfect style match, from traditional ones to exotic!
- Wings: Wings add a finishing touch to your look! Choose a set of wings that suit you best!
- Guardian Fairies: Set out on a journey with these adorable yet reliable combat assistants!

▶ Become part of a guild and enjoy all that it has to offer!
Engage in thrilling Guild Raids together with your guild members!
Fight against other guilds in Guild Battle and bring honor to your guild!

▶ Take on mighty bosses!
Take down powerful bosses alongside your Alliance members!
Encounter all sorts of creatures including field bosses and the Great Gate's Planerin!

▶ Fend off the powerful Planerin!
Reclaim the Great Gate from this massive dragon!
Join forces with your Alliance members and bring peace to the world of TALION!

* Minimum requirements : RAM 2GB, OS 4.4 or later

** This game is available in 한국어, English, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Deutsch, Français, Português, Русский, ไทย
** There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.

[Official Website]
- TALION Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/TalionEN

[Optional] Access authorization notice for gameplay

- STORAGE (data/media/files): The authority is required to store and load your gameplay screenshots and/or video. TALION will not access personal files other than gameplay data. (※ If you are logged in with HIVE on or under Android OS 4.4, the authority is required to change profile images)

- PHONE (device): The authority is required to run in-game events, reward prizes, and check OS version and device model to handle customer inquiries. TALION will not affect or access phone features such as phone calls.

- Microphone: This permission is required to record audio when recording video. The microphone will not be accessed a video is being captured.

※ Optional Permissions will not affect your gameplay experience other than the related services stated above.

* GAMEVIL Official Website : https://www.withhive.com
* GAMEVIL Customer Support : https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

Create character designs that are uniquely you!
Design your characters however you want, from adorable to charismatic!
Express yourself through character gestures. There's even dancing!

▶ Accessories aren't just there for looks! They also boost your Combat Power!
Spruce up your characters with Costumes, Guardian Fairies, Rides, and Wings!
- Rides: Explore the world of TALION with unique Rides designed after different creatures, such as ostriches, rays, etc.
- Costumes: Try on various weapon and outfit Costumes for that perfect style match, from traditional ones to exotic!
- Wings: Wings add a finishing touch to your look! Choose a set of wings that suit you best!
- Guardian Fairies: Set out on a journey with these adorable yet reliable combat assistants!

▶ Become part of a guild and enjoy all that it has to offer!
Engage in thrilling Guild Raids together with your guild members!
Fight against other guilds in Guild Battle and bring honor to your guild!

▶ Take on mighty bosses!
Take down powerful bosses alongside your Alliance members!
Encounter all sorts of creatures including field bosses and the Great Gate's Planerin!

▶ Fend off the powerful Planerin!
Reclaim the Great Gate from this massive dragon!
Join forces with your Alliance members and bring peace to the world of TALION!

* Minimum requirements : RAM 2GB, OS 4.4 or later

title: TALION

container.value: 131, Gasan digital 1-ro, Geumcheon-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

creator: GAMEVIL
descriptionHtml:
■About the Game■

▶ Customize your characters!
Create character designs that are uniquely you!
Design your characters however you want, from adorable to charismatic!
Express yourself through character gestures. There's even dancing!

▶ Accessories aren't just there for looks! They also boost your Combat Power!
Spruce up your characters with Costumes, Guardian Fairies, Rides, and Wings!
- Rides: Explore the world of TALION with unique Rides designed after different creatures, such as ostriches, rays, etc.
- Costumes: Try on various weapon and outfit Costumes for that perfect style match, from traditional ones to exotic!
- Wings: Wings add a finishing touch to your look! Choose a set of wings that suit you best!
- Guardian Fairies: Set out on a journey with these adorable yet reliable combat assistants!

▶ Become part of a guild and enjoy all that it has to offer!
Engage in thrilling Guild Raids together with your guild members!
Fight against other guilds in Guild Battle and bring honor to your guild!

▶ Take on mighty bosses!
Take down powerful bosses alongside your Alliance members!
Encounter all sorts of creatures including field bosses and the Great Gate's Planerin!

▶ Fend off the powerful Planerin!
Reclaim the Great Gate from this massive dragon!
Join forces with your Alliance members and bring peace to the world of TALION!

* Minimum requirements : RAM 2GB, OS 4.4 or later

** This game is available in 한국어, English, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Deutsch, Français, Português, Русский, ไทย
** There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.

[Official Website]
- TALION Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/TalionEN

Smartphone App Permissions

▶ Permissions
The following permissions are requested to allow you access to the listed in-game features.

[Optional Permissions]
"- STORAGE (Photos/Media/Files): Permission is required to save and load in-game screenshots and videos. This app will not access any personal files other than game data.
* If logging in with a HIVE account on an Android version lower than 4.4, permission is required to change your profile picture."
- PHONE (Device): Permission is required to run in-game events, reward prizes, and manage player support. This app will not access device functions such as making phone calls.

* Optional permissions are not required to play. However, disabling them will restrict access to related features.
* If your device is running on a version lower than Android 6.0, you will be unable to set optional permissions. We recommend upgrading to Android 6.0 or higher.
* Some apps may not ask for optional permissions. However, you can still manage your app permissions and deny access.

▶ How to Revoke Permissions
You can reset or revoke permissions using the following steps:

[Android 6.0 and up]
Open Settings > Apps > Select app > Permissions > Allow or deny access

[Android 5.1.1 and lower]
Update your operating system to revoke permissions or delete the app from your device.

* GAMEVIL Official Website : https://www.withhive.com
* GAMEVIL Customer Support : https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

Terms of Service: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
Privacy Policy: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
descriptionShort: ⭐Dive into the stunning world of TALION with your own unique character!⭐

Create character designs that are uniquely you!
Design your characters however you want, from adorable to charismatic!
Express yourself through character gestures. There's even dancing!

▶ Accessories aren't just there for looks! They also boost your Combat Power!

- Rides: Explore the world of TALION with unique Rides designed after different creatures, such as ostriches, rays, etc.
- Costumes: Try on various weapon and outfit Costumes for that perfect style match, from traditional ones to exotic!
- Wings: Wings add a finishing touch to your look! Choose a set of wings that suit you best!
- Guardian Fairies: Set out on a journey with these adorable yet reliable combat assistants!

Engage in thrilling Guild Raids together with your guild members!
Fight against other guilds in Guild Battle and bring honor to your guild!

▶ Take on mighty bosses!
Take down powerful bosses alongside your Alliance members!
Encounter all sorts of creatures including field bosses and the Great Gate's Planerin!

▶ Fend off the powerful Planerin!
Reclaim the Great Gate from this massive dragon!
Join forces with your Alliance members and bring peace to the world of TALION!

* Minimum requirements : RAM 2GB, OS 4.4 or later
